user_query: Find me a popular track of the pop genre from Deezer. I want to know the track details, including the album it belongs to. Also, provide me with the exchange rate from SGD to MYR. Finally, give me a fact about the year 1995.

TaskList.description: Query a music API to find a popular pop track from Deezer and retrieve its details, including the album it belongs to.
Obtain the exchange rate from SGD to MYR using a financial API.
Fetch a historical fact about the year 1995 using a general knowledge API.
